title: Cold water swimming: Mum’s campaign for safety skills
description: Beckie Ramsay, whose son Dylan died in 2011, wants children to be educated on the dangers of open water swimming.

title: Afghan woman 'unbroken' after being shot by her husband
description: Afghan woman Shakila Zareen had to have 22 operations after being shot in the face by her husband.

title: Voice cloning of growing interest to actors and cybercriminals
description: Why voice cloning is not just a threat to actors but could benefit cybercriminals too.

title: England and Italy fans react to Euro final
description: England's hope to end their 55-year wait for a major trophy ended with defeat in a penalty shoot-out as Italy claimed the Euro 2020 crown at Wembley.

title: Italy are champions three years after failing to qualify for the World Cup
description: Watch highlights as Italy beat England 3-2 in a tense penalty shootout to become European champions at Wembley.

title: Sancho, Rashford, and Saka miss England penalties
description: Watch the decisive final penalties of the dramatic shootout as Italy beat England 3-2 on penalties to win the European Championship after a tense 120 minutes ended 1-1 at Wembley.

title: Wimbledon 2021: Novak Djokovic should win 25 Grand Slams - John McEnroe
description: Novak Djokovic not going on to win 25 Grand Slam titles after claiming a record-equalling 20th would "be a major surprise", says John McEnroe.

title: Virgin Galactic: Richard Branson's long, winding path to space
description: The BBC tracks the long, winding road to Sir Richard Branson's flight to the edge of space.

title: Miami building collapse: Inside the recovery operation clearing the ruins
description: Miami-Dade Fire Rescue show how workers are clearing the "enormous" pile of ruins that remains.

title: Pandemic heroes' portraits to be pasted up in Bridgwater
description: A woman who helped depressed farmers is among those being honoured in a giant mural.

title: Covid-19: Masks still expected to be worn indoors after 19 July - Zahawi
description: England is moving from "you must" wear a mask to "you are expected to", the vaccines minister says.

title: Hot air balloon crashes in Nottinghamshire town centre
description: Pilot Andrew Davidson said he has never had such a landing in more than 30 years of ballooning.

title: Pope Francis leads prayers from hospital balcony after colon surgery
description: Francis thanks well-wishers from his hospital balcony following treatment for a colon problem.

title: Offa's Dyke: Monument damaged by 'centuries of benign neglect'
description: The Offa's Dyke earthwork has "a lot of catching up to do" with Hadrian's Wall and Stonehenge.

title: One man dies amid 12 drug overdoses in Swansea
description: The health board in Swansea warned fake anti-anxiety drugs may be linked to a spate of overdoses.

title: US heatwave: Wildfires rage in western states as temperatures soar
description: Tributes are paid to two firefighters who died in a plane crash while responding to a blaze in Arizona.

title: Euro 2020 final: Which side of England's 'Little Italy' will get to celebrate?
description: Around one in five people in the town of Bedford is Italian, meaning divided loyalties for the Euros final.

title: Sir Richard Branson: Space flight will be 'extraordinary'
description: The UK businessman is about to realise a lifetime's ambition by flying to the edge of space.

title: Euro 2020: Queen and Boris Johnson wish England well as final looms
description: The monarch praises the team's "spirit, commitment and pride" ahead of their match against Italy.

title: Covid: NHS backlog in England could reach 13 million, says Sajid Javid
description: Sajid Javid says waiting list projections "shocked me the most" in his first days as health secretary.

title: Messi wins first major trophy with Argentina as Brazil beaten in Copa America final
description: Lionel Messi ends his wait for a first major international title as Argentina beat Brazil in the Copa America final.

title: Covid-19: NHS backlog warning and face masks still needed in Wales
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Sunday.

title: McGregor breaks leg in first-round defeat by Poirier at UFC 264
description: Dustin Poirier beats Conor McGregor in the first round of their trilogy fight at UFC 264 in Las Vegas.

title: Meet the Italians standing between England and glory
description: Everything you need to know about the Italians who stand in the way of England and the European Championship trophy

title: The Papers: 'We Kane be heroes' and 'jab gap to be cut'
description: Sunday's papers report a "heartfelt message" from the Queen ahead of England's Euro final against Italy.

title: Australia: New South Wales confirms first Covid-related death in 10 months
description: A woman in her 90s died in Sydney, as state officials warn of a surge in new infections.
